AND #{endDate} >= t2.start_date
and idn_contract_point in (select distinct idn_system_point from TPA_TCONTRACT_POINT t3 where 1 = 1 and t3.idn_contract_agreement in (select idn_contract_agreement from tpa_tcontract_agreement t6 where 1 = 1
AND nvl(t6.end_date, to_date('9999/12/31', 'yyyy/mm/dd')) >= #{startDate}
AND #{endDate} >= t6.start_date
and t6.idn_contract_request in (select idn_contract_request from tpa_tcontract_request t4 where 1 = 1
AND nvl(t4.end_date, to_date('9999/12/31', 'yyyy/mm/dd')) >= #{startDate}
AND #{endDate} >= t4.start_date
and t4.idn_contract in (select idn_contract from tpa_tcontract t5 where 1 = 1

and t5.idn_contract = #{idn_contract} and t5.idn_pipeline_system = #{idn_system} ) ) ) ) ))))

and t1.idn_system_point in (select idn_contract_point from tpa_tsystem_point_param t2 where 1=1
